description: This file serves as a command-line interface (CLI) wrapper around the 'nanoid' library, providing options for ID generation with customizable size and alphabet. It handles command-line arguments, displays help messages, and outputs the generated IDs.

methods.name: print
methods.description: Outputs a message to standard output with a newline.

methods.name: error
methods.description: Outputs an error message to standard error and exits the process.
